LineIdsProperties.description: A collection of all sales order line related ids as a common set

LineId.description: The (required) LineId Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying this sales order line amongst other lines, in the form of Line::[type]_[sourceSystem]_[LineKey] e.g ::Sale_PMC_123456789_1

LineKey.description: The 'natural' sales order line number key, typically either a combination of Number & a 'sequence number' (derived) OR explicitly supplied unique Id from source - also used to construct the synthetic SOL Xfuze Ids. e.g 123456789_1

LineProductKey.description: The 'natural' sales order line product key, typically either a combination of Number & a 'product id' (e.g SKU, EAN) OR explicitly supplied unique Id from source - also used to construct the synthetic SOL Xfuze Ids. e.g 123456789_1201764

LineProductKeyType.description: The type of the product part of LineProductKey e.g Sku, EAN

LineSeq.description: The ordinal line sequence number e.g 2

OriginalLineId.description: The LineId Id, in Xfuze canonical form, identifying an 'original' sales order, in the form of ::[type]_[sourceSystem]_[OriginalKey] e.g ::Sale_PMC_987654321

OriginalLineKey.description: The original 'natural' sales order 'key' / 'number', typically as a way to link related orders together the can be physically seperate and need a linking e.g Return,Exchange,

OriginalLineSeq.description: The original ordinal line sequence number e.g 1

Ids.description: The (required) common set of order Ids for this order, not all a required individually, only what can be mapped & derived
